title: Lindsie Chrisley gazes adoringly at husband in Instagram snap after dad Todd claimed she had affairs
text:
She accused her reality TV star dad Todd Chrisley of trying to blackmail her over a sex tape while he claimed she'd had extra-marital affairs with The Bachelorette alums Robby Hayes and Josh Murray.

But it seems Lindsie Chrisley is determined to let everyone know that her marriage to Will Campbell is going strong.

The 30-year-old posted a photo of herself and Will to her Instagram on Sunday showing them gazing adoringly at each other during a trip to the North Georgia State Fair.

Going strong: Lindsie Chrisley posted a photo of herself and husband Will Campbell to Instagram Sunday showing them gazing adoringly at each other at North Georgia State Fair

In the snap, Lindsie holds a corn dog in one hand as she cuddles up to her husband of seven years.

Will is holding a large beverage cup with straw and has an arm around his wife.

In the caption, Lindsie shared lyrics from the Lee Brice country song Rumo, writing: 'There’s a rumor going ’round about me & you Stirring up our little town the last week or two So tell me why we even trying to deny this feeling I feel it, don’t you feel it too?'

'There’s a rumor going ’round & ’round & ’round What d’you say we make it true? We make it true Oh, we make it true Well I can shut ’em down, tell ’em all they’re crazy I can do whatever you want me to do, baby Or you could lay one on me right now We could really give them something to talk about,' she wrote.

The couple eloped in January 2012 and share a son Jackson. In 2016, they announced they planned to divorce but they have since reconciled.

Rumors: The daughter of reality star Todd Chrisley has brushed off claims by her estranged dad that she had extramarital affairs. She and Will, who have a son Jackson, wed in 2012, announced plans to divorce in 2016 and then reconciled

Troubles: Todd made his infidelity allegations after Lindsie accused him and her half-brother Chase (pictured in 2016) of threatening to blackmail her over a sex tape

Claims: Todd told Access that Lindsie had affairs with The Bachelorette alums Robby Hayes, left, and Josh Murray, right, in 2016

Lindsie is Todd Chrisley's daughter from his first marriage and appeared on the family's reality show Chrisley Knows Best on USA Network.

However, she left the series in 2017 after five seasons due to a falling out with her father.

In August, Todd and second wife Julie, 46, appeared in federal court in Atlanta charged with 12 counts of bank fraud and federal tax evasion. They pleaded not guilty.

Lindsie has accused her father and her half-brother Chase of trying to blackmail her over a sex tape, threatening her in an effort to help cover up his alleged tax evasion.

Both have denied the allegations.

Legal woes: In August, Todd and second wife Julie, 46, appeared in federal court in Atlanta charged with 12 counts of bank fraud and federal tax evasion. They pleaded not guilty

However, in denying her allegations, Todd claimed his daughter had had extramarital relationships with Robby Hayes and Josh Murray in 2016.

He told Access: 'We have tried to keep Lindsie's extramarital relationships with Robby Hayes and Josh Murray private for her sake since August of 2016.'

'Sadly, for reasons we can only guess at, she ran to the sheriff's office to accuse her brother of buying a sex tape of her and Robby, which was a complete lie, and now she's telling more lies about me,' he said. 'Although our hearts are broken, Lindsie is our daughter and we will always love her.'

Lindsie's lawyer Musa Ghanayem issued a statement at the time: 'Lindsie has been a constant target of lies, harassment and threats from her family and as a result, has been distancing herself from the Chrisley family since 2017.'
description: In the snap from North Georgia State Fair, Lindsie holds a corn dog in one hand as she cuddles up to her husband of seven years. Will holds a large beverage cup and has an arm around his wife.
